name: Daily CL Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion
description: Mean-reverting futures strategy on daily NYMEX Crude Oil (CL) that enters oversold/overbought extremes defined by Bollinger Bands (20,2) and RSI(14). Longs when price closes below lower band and RSI<30; shorts when price closes above upper band and RSI>70. Exits at centre band or RSI 40-60 zone, with protective 1.5 % stop and 3 % profit target. Positions sized to risk 2 % of equity per trade.
